row.process: : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER AGENT# = &AGENT# : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER LOGIN# = &LOGIN# : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# = "YES" : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_JSON_OBJ# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE" : SET &ACTOBJ# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&UC4RB_JSON_OBJ#,WAIT) : IF &ACTOBJ# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#,&ERRINS#) : PRINT "Error while activating &UC4RB_JSON_OBJ# object :&MESSAGE#" : ELSE : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,&ACTOBJ#,"RETCODE") : P "EXECUTED OBJECT [&UC4RB_JSON_OBJ#] STATUS: &STATUS#" : IF &STATUS# <> "0" : PRINT "Error while executing &UC4RB_JSON_OBJ# object" : ENDIF : ENDIF
